text: ahead of this weekend 's premier league action , sportsmail will be providing you with all you need to know about every fixture , with team news , provisional squads , betting odds and opta stats . here is all the information you need for liverpool 's home clash with manchester city ... liverpool vs manchester city -lrb- anfield -rrb- . team news . liverpool . philippe coutinho will return to the side to face manchester city on sunday having been rested for their europa league exit against besiktas . midfielder jordan henderson was also left at home with an ankle problem and that will need to be assessed at the weekend . defender mamadou sakho has resumed training this week after a hip injury while full-back glen johnson could be back after illness meant he missed the trip to istanbul . provisional squad : mignolet , can , skrtel , sakho , ibe , henderson , allen , markovic , sterling , coutinho , sturridge , ward , lovren , johnson , toure , moreno , lallana , lambert , borini , balotelli . philippe coutinho will return to the liverpool side to face manchester city in the premier league on sunday . manchester city . manuel pellegrini has a fully-fit squad for sunday 's trip to liverpool . key midfielder yaya toure is poised to return after missing tuesday 's champions league loss to barcelona through suspension . striker wilfried bony , who has made two substitute appearances in the past week , could make his first start since his # 25million move from swansea . provisional squad : hart , caballero , sagna , zabaleta , kompany , demichelis , mangala , boyata , clichy , kolarov , navas , nasri , silva , milner , toure , lampard , fernando , fernandinho , aguero , dzeko , bony , jovetic . yaya toure is to return after missing tuesday 's champions league loss to barcelona through suspension . kick-off : sunday , midday -
